body.name: KKUOD Wired Mouse with Ergonomic Design Reduces Hand Fatigue Muscle Strain, Silent USB Computer Mouse, 1600 DPI Office and Home Mice (Black, Wired)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 52 mins
features: 【4 LIGHTING MODE】Wired LED mouse adopt interesting rainbow lighting design, one button to adjust 4 RGB color effects: Rainbow Streaming Light(Default), Rainbow Breathing Light, Neon, Floating Light. The RGB backlit also can be turned off as you want
【Ergonomic Design】Places your hand in a natural relax position using a unique raised design, preventing hand fatigue and reducing muscular strain (As compared with a traditional non-vertical mouse)

【High-Precision and Durability】1600 DPI movement resolution enables responsive cursor control for precise tracking, works on most surfaces. Tested over 3 million times keystroke life, the wired mouse ensures responsive click and longer lifespan for daily use

【Silent and Easy to Use】Silent USB mouse keep you focus on your work without disturbing others. The simple USB corded mouse, just plug and play. Eliminates the trouble of replacing batteries, save your time and improve your study efficiency or work efficiency
【Universal Compatibility】The computer mice has a wide range of compatibility, compatible with computer, laptop, desktop, PC, laptop, Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quiet Clicking Completely silent when you use the wired mouse, avoid disturbing your colleagues and family. Plug and Play Needn’t charge, needn’t to replace the battery, and the weight of the wired mouse is lighter than wireless mouse. Ideal for daily home & office use. High Precision High dpi movement resolution enables responsive cursor control for precise tracking, works on most surfaces. Strong Durability Tested over 3 million times keystroke life, the wired mouse ensures responsive click and longer lifespan for daily use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wired mouse wins again
reviews.reviewText: In the past, I have purchased several wireless mouse and they seem to last less than a year. I decided to give this one a try. I am very happy with my purchase. This mouse is cute, efficient, and very quiet. It does what it needs to do, as you can see it is plug-and-play and it works with my new mini PC. Again, I am extremely happy with my purchase and the price was just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks good, feels good, and it's responsive. I'm happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silent, reliable, and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: The mouse is very silent which makes it great if you want to do anything that involves heavy mouse usage in a room with other people without being too annoying with your clicking. The mouse itself is also very comfy and fits inside the palm very nice. The tracking is also very good, and has held up over time without degrading. The lights are also nice because they can be turned off in case you don't need them on, or don't like RGB lights. Sometimes my mouse will bug out and the tracking will go all crazy but I think that's because I have smacked it against the table on accident a few times, and is not a fault of the mouse itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Terrific basic mouse
reviews.reviewText: I almost gave this five stars. It is one of the most comfortable mouse devices I've used. It fits the hand well and feels a little lower-profile than most mice (mouses?). It reacts well, the buttons are totally quiet, and the light is not distracting (if it is it can be turned off).I give it only 4 stars for two reasons: 1) The light does not have a memory, so your preferred mode out of 5 options has to be reset whenever you turn the system on. 2) There are no forward/back buttons that are found on many mice. Still, for a basic ten-dollar mouse it's very nice.It gets a solid 4 stars for several reasons: 1) It is rounded to the feel, without sharp edges. My prior mouse was a neat, sci-fi looking 'gamer' mouse, but the edges were squared off and could be uncomfy. This feels nice and comfy to the hand. 2) It can be used as a right or left-handed mouse (unlike some gamer mice). 3) It is a very functional, simple mouse. It has one 1600 dpi setting that is fairly perfect for computer use. The user doesn't have to mess with multiple settings that 99.99% of users out there don't need. 4) The price is reasonable.So overall I'm quite pleased with this mouse. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles of more expensive or fancier mice, but it does what a mouse is supposed to do, well and comfortably. It's not so bright that it messes with my vision while using it, and it controls the pointer/cursor very well... which really is bottom line, what a mouse is supposed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A mouse with it's own light show! Works well, and takes a very light touch to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY PLEASED WITH THIS MOUSE
reviews.reviewText: The changing colors on this thing are fun, but the real beauty of it for me is the size. I have 'chunky' hands for a woman and it's a very good fit. It's lightweight, moves smoothly and easily, has excellent sensitivity plus the price is excellent.This is a replacement for the same model I bought last year. Unfortunately that one gave out as it kept slipping off my mouse pad and hitting the floor or sometimes other objects. Dang! I have a 'pull-out' articulating keyboard tray with an attached articulating mouse support. If I leave the mouse support in the wrong position, the mouse will fall. But Amazon worked their magic and I had my new one the next day.So what's my point? Failure of the previous mouse was my fault, so I'm being much more careful with this one and expect it to last MUCH longer.This is a great mouse considering the price! So if you need a new one, this is a good one to try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only had it a week, but it works just fine and is inexpensive. Made in Germany. The button to turn 0FF the bottom lite is nice...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this. so comfortable to use and love the changing colors

Está muy bonito el mouse, se ve muy lindo. El color es igual a la foto y las lucecitas de colores se ven increíbles. Muy suavecito en su uso y el clic prácticamente no se escucha. Lo único malo es que, a los pocos días usándolo, comenzó a escucharse un rechinido al hacer clic con el botón derecho y eso me desespera un poco por el sonido
